Tooltip.Time:
Adjust time using the slider.
 (format: HHMM, only number)
Tooltip.Location: Select a location by moving the slider.
Tooltip.Coordinate:
Enter X and Y coordinates 
 for precise positioning.
(format: only number)
Tooltip.Direction: Choose the NPC's facing direction using the slider.
Tooltip.Action:
Select an action 
 for the NPC using the slider.
Tooltip.Talk: Enter the dialogue NPC will say upon arrival.
Tooltip.Cancel:
Cancel changes 
 and revert to the previous state.
Tooltip.Toggle:
Switch between user-edited 
 and original schedule data.
